snippet.title: Long live the Raptors: Presenting an NBA full of dinosaur mascots

snippet.title: NCAA Baseball Tournament 2013: ESPN plots to put a Hoover in every home
snippet.description:
NCAA Baseball Tournament 2013: ESPN plots to put a Hoover in every home by Steven Godfrey on May 31 2013, 10:48a
College baseball is fighting soft balls, weird bats and skimpy scholarships, but ESPN is betting that the SEC's other favorite pastime is about to become the next major college sport.

snippet.title: The best (and worst) NBA rumors of 2013: An ode to trade season
snippet.description:
The best (and worst) NBA rumors of 2013: An ode to trade season by Mike Prada on Feb 22 2013, 3:00p
As we say goodbye to another frantic deadline in the Internet age, let's take one look back at some of the more hilarious rumors we discussed this year.
